title: NoNoise Motorsport Filtered Earplugs
features: Patented ceramic filter — reduces wind noise by 24 dB
Medical-grade thermoplastic — conforms to ear canal
description: Wind noise at highway speeds regularly exceeds 100 dB — enough to cause permanent hearing damage. NoNoise Motorsport earplugs use a patented ceramic filter to reduce harmful wind noise by 24 dB while preserving critical frequencies like speech, horns, and sirens. Essential for any rider who values long-term hearing health.
